author: jerenkrantz
msg: - Remove MIN_BLK_SIZE bogosity.  If the user wants to allocate small chunks,
the library must not get in the way even if *we* think it's silly.  As
long as they have enough overhead allocated, we shouldn't get in the way.
- Fix bug in find_block_by_offset() that would return 0 instead of prev if
includes is set.  This would prohibit coalescing from occuring on the
freelist if done in sequential order.  Therefore, small allocs, freeing
those chunks, and a subsequent large alloc would fail.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: The style police have been called back to the scene of the crime.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: The style police come before the bug police.  (Bug police are on the case.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add testrmm program to test the RMM subsystem

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Bring over change from APR to allow cleaning of the libtool files on
each invocation of buildconf.sh.  This allows switching from 1.3 to 1.4
